column1: left arm over, wide outside off, scoots through the keeper on the second bounce...given wide, although there was a noise. Lot a sand comes up as the ball pitches in front of the keeper
pushed across outside off, goes for a big drive on the up and gets beaten
back of a length outside off, punched square to the covers
at middle and off, back of a length, angled down to third man with an open face
walks at the bowler straight away and plays a short-of-a-length ball to the on side
given lbw, a debut duck! Trapped on the crease, ball keeps a touch low, heading for middle and off but that looks to have pitched outside leg. We'll need another look at that
short of a length at the hip, worked into midwicket
round the wicket, good length at off stump, defended

brilliant work behind the stumps, he's gone! Bancroft uses his feet, O'Keefe sees him coming and slips it down the leg side. Philippe is very quick with the gloves, brings it back from quite wide and Bancroft is miles out
full outside off, gets forward and pushes to cover
short, pushed into the pads, worked backward of square
fuller, fired into leg stump, deflects off the pads
full and straight, driven back to the bowler
touch shorter, slides on with the air, played to cover off the back foot. Terrific over
short, down the leg side, he goes for the pull and there's an appeal for a glove down the leg side...no wide called
well bowled! Angled across on off stump, back of a length, beats the outside edge
that's a great shot! Short of a length on the pads, flicks it very strongly behind square and it goes all the way. Very strong wrists
dropped! At backward point, drives on the up outside off, picks out Jordan Silk - one of the best fielders in Australia - and it bursts out of his hands
another powerful drive, this time he finds cover...he's not holding back
beats the edge again as he aims to angle a short-of-a-length delivery to third man
gives himself a touch of room, exposes all the stumps, then drives into the covers
that's a terrific shot, whips a full delivery wide of mid-on. Super timing and placement
excellent footwork, he comes down the pitch and drives inside-out over extra cover. Great shot
a flatter delivery on the stumps, played to midwicket
sliced in the air, but over backward point! Came down the pitch again, lost his shape this time but managed to clear the infield
just over the bowler! He's taking him over, driven just over the fingertips of O'Keefe towards long-off
starts with a good length ball on off stump, defended
picks out deep square leg! That's very careless. Short of a length from Curran, he eyed up the short boundary with a pull but couldn't get the distance. A safe catch from the debutant Hayden Kerr
back of a length outside, pushed firmly past the bowler...seems like the ball is stopping a little for the seamers
fuller, at the stumps, driven towards mid-on. Was in the air for a while
full outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, Turner allows another one to go through
back of a length outside off, bat twists in his hands and there's not much timing as he pushes towards mid-on
short outside off, stands tall and drives handsomely off the back foot to cover

that's a tight second run! Short, straight, pulled to deep square leg and Turner takes on the arm. And he's short! Excellent throw from Dwarshuis, pitching in the sandy outfield took some pace off it but Philippe did very well to complete the run out
beaten! A uncertain dab outside off to a length ball that just shapes away a fraction
short of a length, defended to the on side
lovely shot, short outside off, square driven from the back foot wide of third man. This time the second is comfortable
left-arm over, short of a length, driven to the off side
on middle and off, back of a length, defended...nice smooth action from Kerr
full outside off, beats the outside edge as he drives
dragged down short on off stump and that's hammered through midwicket with a dismissive pull. Some power in that
adjusts his length, goes full at the stumps, pushed to the covers
back of a length at off stump, angled to point
full and straight, flicked to long-on
whipped along the ground through midwicket, wide of long-on
full outside off, driven to the cover sweeper
gets across outside off then sweeps to deep backward square
full at off stump, stays just leg side of the ball, opens the face and places through the covers
short of a length outside off, pushed back to the bowler...O'Keefe hustles through another
full at off stump, forced through midwicket
short outside off, punched square off the back foot wide of backward point...third man does well to cut it off. Have to be very careful sliding on this outfield
a slower ball, full outside off, Green is through his shot early
full outside off, nicely into a drive to the cover sweeper
short of a length, driven to deep cover
throws his hands through some width and slices down to third man
round the wicket, flicked down to long-on
driven to cover off the back foot
full outside leg, pushed to long-on
on the stumps, gets down on his back knee and plays a powerful sweep to deep square
driven to long-off
in the air through the off side, placed wide of long-off so they make the second
back-cuts a short ball to third man
crunched! A length ball outside off, he heaves it through midwicket. Long levers, making use of them
leg side again, and powerful, but this time he finds deep midwicket as he pulls a short ball from outside off
short again outside off, drags the pull into midwicket
keeps it short outside off Marsh goes across the crease and pulls to deep midwicket
gets this over mid-off, not sure what to call that shot! Short outside off, goes off side this time as he flat-bats it over mid-off
digs a yorker off the stumps through square leg, a lack of timing helps get back for the second
dropped! A mighty touch chance to his left as Marsh bunts back a low full toss
works another full toss to long-on
slides on with the arm from round the wicket, worked to deep midwicket
comes down the pitch and loses his shape, skews off a thick inside edge towards midwicket
length ball outside off, drives and can't beat the man at point
round the wicket, short into the pads, pulled straight to short fine leg. He got away with that
swing and miss, a back of a length ball outside off and he was aiming through square leg
full toss outside off but he can only drive it to mid-off on the edge of the circle
a shorter delivery, angled in from round the wicket, a slower ball, worked to the leg side
moves outside leg, Dwarshuis saw him go and pushed it wide outside off...but inside the guideline. Excellent delivery
a yorker outside off, jabbed to mid-off and that brings up the fifty stand which the Scorchers badly needed
round the wicket, worked off the stumps to midwicket and needs to get a hustle on for the single
uses his feet and flicks to long-on
swept from outside off to deep square and he takes on the throw, safe this time
big full toss which he heaves to deep midwicket, didn't take full advantage
clubbed from wide outside off to deep midwicket...running them up!

the full toss strikes this time! Awful ball, really, but they work a fair bit...big full toss, he went to clear the big leg side and couldn't get the distance. Taken by deep square running in. They are checking the height and it's fine
full outside off, driven off the front foot wide of mid-off
hammered! And just short of deep midwicket. Connected very sweetly as he pulls this from outside off, almost too sweetly
short of a length down the leg side, does to pull it away and misses...a strangled appeal for the catch
back outside off, short of a length, chopped to backward point
short of a length, worked into midwicket
nails the pull this time! Short outside off, he fetches it to the leg side and places it wide of deep square
banged in very short and mistimes to the leg side, dribbles towards midwicket off the cue end
worked off the stumps through midwicket
flipped in the air for a little while, but safely to long-on
taken at long-on! That's a massive blow. Aiming to go straight down the ground, got too far underneath it and only gets height rather than distance
driven to long-off
full at off stump, eased down the ground to long-off
appeal for lbw as this slides on with the arm and takes Agar on the front pad, but that's sliding past leg stump
full and straight, slower ball, worked to the leg side
finds deep square! The shot looked good off the bat, a elegant flip-pull, but it's towards the long boundary and ends up being a comfortable catch. Been some poor decision-making this innings
edged to third man, forcing a length ball off the back foot
full outside off, driven to mid-off
low full toss outside off, aiming for the yorker, driven wide of deep cover
back of a length outside off, pulled off the front foot between long-on and deep midwicket
miles in the air, and taken! A full slower delivery, Jordan launches it straight up in the air, Abbott calls early for it and makes the ground towards midwicket
full at off stump, tapped to the covers
length ball, straight, defended
full at the stumps, pushed towards mid-off. Sixers happy to concede the singles
back of a length outside off, whipped towards deep square and they make a late decision to abort the second. Terrific one-handed pick up by Dwarshuis
back of a length at off stump, opens the face and finds point
round the wicket, back of a length, pulled into the pitch off the bottom edge
excellent catch at long leg! A short ball, Richardson goes for the hook, can't get over the top of it...O'Keefe takes it very low, but barely had to move
good length outside off, pushed to the covers
tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
full and straight, pushes it just to the left of the bowler
dropped! Long-on running in, Abbott can't cling on...Fawad came down the pitch and clothed his loft down the ground
clears long-on! He brings out a mighty blow over long-on, a big full toss, swung down the ground. And it's a no-ball for height. The first six of his T20 career!
would you believe it, he's done it again! A length ball served up by Curran, Fawad strikes it magnificently straight down the ground. Over the sightscreen
a slower short ball, beats the top edge as he aims to guide it to third man
gets the yorker in, driven to long-off
gives himself a touch of room, drives to deep cover
what a strike! Superb batting. Goes deep in his crease, Curran goes for the yorker and it's fractionally off, sweetly driven over mid-off
finds mid-off and the innings ends with a slower short ball which he chips to mid-off
round the wicket, good length outside off, defended to cover
short outside off, steps back towards leg and square cuts through the point. Poor ball, good shot
lovely footwork down the pitch this time and a very powerful drive which finds cover
just over mid-on! Skips down the pitch again and lofts this over a leaping Jordan...sweetly struck and with just enough height
pushed down the leg side, swept fine. Richardson chases it then bowls the ball in, still protecting that shoulder
nicely bowled, done in the air this time and pushes back to the bowler
over the wicket, back of a length outside off, defended to backward point
into the pavilion! A short delivery, Hughes gets inside the line and hooks it well back over the fine leg rope
beats the outside edge as he drives off the back foot, a short-of-a-length delivery that wasn't quite there for the shot
back of a length, straight, pulled to deep square leg
excellent use of the wrists! Comes forward and drives between cover and backward point. Was in the air for a while
punched neatly off the back foot to cover. He's looking good
round the wicket, back of a length, hint of nip as it beats the inside edge and takes Hughes high on the pads
fuller, takes the pad as Hughes plays across the line, sliding down the leg side
length ball at off stump, forced into midwicket
comes down the pitch and gives himself room outside off, drives square of the wicket to point
angled into the pads, tucked backward of square
full and straight, whipping across the line again and gets an inside edge into his pads. Good opening over from Kelly
short of a length outside off, stands tall and plays a crisp square drive off the back foot to the sweeper
over the wicket, full outside off, driven to deep cover
length ball, he goes to the on side and picks out mid-on
terrific yorker, that's his trademark, Philippe manages to get the toe end on it
superbly played, power and placement...a slower ball, length outside off, he waits for it and does brilliant to drill this wide of mid-off
full, angled into the pads, he misses his flick and it deflects off the pads to short fine leg
what a stroke! Gets across to off stump and plays a bottom-handed whip over midwicket. Fantastic. Plenty of KP in that
back to back boundaries, low full toss outside off, driven straight down the ground
moves to leg, it's back of a length, played with an open face to backward point
short, into the body, gets inside the line and pulls it wide of the keeper...short fine leg can't chase it down
length outside off, he drives and the bottom hand comes off the bat, the ball lobs towards mid-off
gets across the stumps and works a length delivery through square leg. Some very fine batting in that over
round the wicket, driven in the air as he comes forward and drives a googly
gets his front leg across outside off and sweeps strongly backward of square, good placement
and again! Fetches it from full outside off, slog swept through midwicket but it's only a boundary because Kelly lets it through his legs. Maybe got a rough bounce out of the sand
short outside off, square drives to cover
dances down the pitch and drives inside out over cover, fantastic shot and it was called before it happened by David Warner
neat footwork again and calmly driven to long-off
gets underneath this as he aims a powerful sweep/pull, gets a top edge over short fine leg
pushed down the leg side, he goes for the sweep...is there bat involved? No, so it's called a wide
swept from outside off to deep square
loses his shape a little this time as he goes to the leg side
too short, allows him to get underneath it with a squat-pull, goes one bounce to deep square
works a straight delivery down to long-on
skims away! Terrific power, he sweeps a full delivery from outside leg stump and it's at the boundary before you can blink
full outside off, a flowing drive to deep cover
short of a length outside off, a rasping back-foot drive to deep cover
finds cover on the edge of the ring as he drives
dragged on! Finally something for the Scorchers. A slower ball from Jordan, an off cutter, Hughes aims to the leg side and gets an inside edge into the stumps
back of a length outside off, neatly off the mark as he drives from the back foot to deep cover
full outside off, square drives along the ground to deep point
swept off the stumps in front of square
a googly, skids on a touch as Vince plays back
short outside off, driven to deep cover
very wide outside off, he fetches it with the sweep and finds deep square
eases forward and places into the covers
down the pitch, reaches out and drives down to long-off to reach fifty off 30 balls. Very classy innings
oh my goodness! You won't see any better than this however much cricket you watch. He comes down the pitch and lofts it inside-out over long-off. Magnificent
goes for the sweep, misses and it's not far from bowling him
a bit of a bottom-handed shovel down to long-on
worked off the pads backward of square
drives a length ball into the covers
gets across outside off and scoops this over short fine leg. This is quite a display from a hugely talented young player
full at the stumps, driven firmly to cover
back of a length, placed nicely wide of the cover sweeper
full outside off, a stand-and-deliver drive to mid-off
hammered! Short of a length, 143kph, pulled with great power through square leg
over the top of the stumps as he swings and misses to the leg side
clipped off the stumps to deep square leg
tucked off the pads to deep square
a googly, touch short, sent to deep midwicket
plays back and pushes to the bowler
gets beaten as he cuts at this one outside off, perhaps not quite as short as he thought
makes contact this time, cuts to deep point
another magnificent shot! As good as the one he played a little while ago, down the pitch and inside-out over cover. Could watch those all day. Wonderful batting

this looks like a great catch! Vince whips across the line of a full delivery, sounds like an inside out, Inglis grabs it one-handed, low to his left. The umpires converge. The soft signal is out. Well, not sure Vince has hit this, might have hit the ground. Hang on, it may have clipped leg stump! It's been taken cleanly. This isn't DRS, remember, it's just the umpires checking. And third umpire confirms the out decision. That will keep the umpiring debate going!
terrific yorker, does well to keep it out
driven to mid-off
works a full ball outside off to deep square
back of a length at off stump, angled behind point
another yorker, outside off, defended
full, opens the face as he drives through cover
brings out the reverse sweep, takes this from outside leg but doesn't really time it
worked off the pads into midwicket
comes down the pitch and drives to long-on
deep in the crease, flicks into midwicket and the weight of the shot is perfect for a second
driven to deep midwicket with a straight bat
back of a length, heaved over midwicket
clears deep square! Picks this up very sweetly and pulls it over the rope
length ball, squeezed through square leg
great shot! Immense power from the bottom hand as he whips a full, straight delivery to deep midwicket
an appeal for lbw as he aim for a repeat of the previous shot, maybe outside the line

on the roof of the ladies stand! What a way to finish it That's a thunderous blow to secure a crushing victory. The ball is lodged into the gutter, Philippe picking this off the stumps and whipping it miles over deep midwicket. What a shot, what an innings
